item.title: Debugging With Tracing in Elixir
item.description: If you are a video person, and have 24 minutes to spend with, just jump over to this ElixirConf 2020 - Debugging Live Systems on the BEAM talk by Jeffery Utter. This article is a downgraded version of the video ðŸ˜‚. I wrote this before the video is published. Then, I came across it and learn a lot more from there.
